name: Eagle Multiplayer
description:
Eagle Multiplayer is here! With an all new massive map - our largest and most ambitious yet. So large, we had to include warp zones. It might actually be too large, so please do let us know. Fly and dive your customizable eagle. Hunt down prey including bears, mice, deer. Too many enemy animals to name. Enemies include Bats, Bears, Owls, Parrots, Crows, Pigeons, Seagulls, People, Knights. Part of the map includes a viking village. Prepare to enter the world as a bird. Zoom your way to victory in this high quality animal simulator. Avoid total chaos and come out as the ultimate Eagle.

Customize your Eagle with multiple color options. Feather combinations include Blue, Black, Brown, and Mixed Colors. Bird Multiplayer in full 3D!

Choose either the online version, or play offline and collect your needed magic items. When all the magic items are collected, the giant bosses will appear.


TOP APP FEATURES INCLUDING:

** Control your very own Bald Eagle!!
** PVP tournament style multiplayer mode
** Real-Time Online and Offline 3D Bird Simulator
** Huge 3D Open World Map - and I mean YUUUGE!!
** Ultra Realistic Weather Simulation - real weather with highly realistic lightning and thunder effects
** 4 Special Magic Skills -Fireball, Ice, Electricity, and Invincibility
** Loaded with enemies like Bears, Dove, Knights, Cats, Parrots, Owls, Pigeon, Seagull, Mice, and Dragons
** Also includes Online Chat!!
Locate all the magic items in the offline map in order to craft your magic. Upgrade your animal speed, strength, and stamina. Use your magic skills selectively against your foes.

Visit the Wildfoot Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/wildfootgames for cool updates and new releases.  We concentrate on making high quality, 3D animal simulators. If you like this bird multiplayer game or have any other ideas, please let us know about it. Have a Wildfoot day and thanks for playing!
